messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Liv: We can one-shot this Trainer,
can’t we, Liz?
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_1:
Liv: This Trainer...will brag about
beating us, Liz.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_1:
Liv: You only have one Pokémon?
That’s so boring!
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_1:
Liv: Oh! You’re that Trainer!
Let’s get payback, Liz!
messages.TRMSG_PRE_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Liz: We’re the strongest in our
class!
messages.TRMSG_POST_DOUBLE_BATTLE_2:
Liz: This Trainer...is really happy about
beating us, Liv.
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_NOT_ENOUGH_POKEMON_2:
Liz: Um, will you battle with us?
Me and Liv?
messages.TRMSG_DOUBLE_BATTLE_REMATCH_2:
Liz: We’re the best in our class.
We can’t be losers all the time!
